title: The Last of Us Part II Sells 4 Million Copies in Three Days - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.26.20
description:
Greg and Tim talk about the TLOU2 sales, Microsoft Stores are closing,  

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:30 - Housekeeping
Monday, we’re taking over GameSpot’s charity stream! Noon on GameSpot.com we’re taking Play For All By Storm and raising money for … Black Lives Matter and Direct Relief
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:38 - Suck it, haters -- TLOU2 the fastest-selling first-party PS4 exclusive, Eric Lempel @ PS
00:19:20 - Goodbye Microsoft Stores, Chris Welch @ The Verge
00:38:20 - Avengers Combat Started with Black Widow, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:42:50 - Have reviewers already decided that the Avengers game is not going to be great and won't give it a fair shot when it comes out? - Best Friends Q:CJ
00:53:08 - MINECRAFT DUNGEONS: JUNGLE AWAKENS DLC next Week, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:55:00 - Out today
00:57:00 -  Reader mail   -
00:59:50 - Can we talk about the PS4's jet engine fan? - 2038 Pokémon CEO(PC/Xbox/Twitter)
01:03:50 - Squad Up:Cale Dolfincorn -Discord:
Dolfincorn#0462 (its case sensitive) Twitter:@dolfincorn Xbox:Dolfincorn
You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Imran and Blessing
Wednesday: Greg and Gary
Thursday: Greg and Blessing
Friday: Blessing and Greg
